projects.title: MandelPlot
projects.desc: A fully interactive, beautiful visualizer of the Mandelbrot Set. Built using HTML/CSS/JS, powered by Web Workers.

projects.title: AP Statistics Website
projects.desc: A complementary website for AP Statistics, equipped with pages of notes and a calculator for each major concept.

projects.title: SMC Data Challenge
projects.desc: Uses machine learning alongside image processing to complete the first challenge in the SMCDC23.

projects.title: KenKen Solver
projects.desc: Uses image processing to read a KenKen board from a screenshot and solve it using backtracking.
